relevant_findings.lesions: Well-demarcated, edematous, friable, erythematous-to-violaceous plaques on the dorsal surfaces of the hands, gray discoloration at the margins.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesions expanded including the proximal interphalangeal joints and became more erosive and painful.

relevant_findings.lesions: Partially denuded bullous lesions on the dorsal surface of both hands, extending over the fingers.
